resources.string: You will be notified 30 minutes before start.
The event has been added to your favorites
The event has been removed from your favorites
Create a favorite by clicking on the heart in the upper right corner when viewing an event.
When the heart is blue the event is in your list of favorites. Click on the heart again to remove it from your favorite list.
You will get a reminder 30 minutes before an event starts. This means that you can focus on enjoying the concerts instead of worrying about missing events.
The festival starts in [antal] days. Woohoo!
I think you would like this event on the Malmö festival: [artist]. Sent from Malmöfestivalen for Android. See more here: [url]
Click on this link in your Android phone:

Malmöfestivalen 2012 for Android is a mobile mashup. It therefore cannot be guaranteed that the information contained in the application is 100% correct or up to date. Use of the application is at your own risk. However, as much as possible is being done to make the application as good as possible. :o)
Freelance .Net developer and consultant with more than 10 years of experience.

Show current and upcoming events

Favorites with reminders (never miss your favorite event)

Sharing events with friends

Map showing all scenes and GPS-positioning of the user

Links directly to the Malmöfestival site (malmofestivalen.se)

Languages: Swedish, Danish, English, German.

Opens Spotify and Youtube native apps, if installed.

Browse festival categories (movies, art, fashion etc.) and events in these categories.

Download updates continuously in the app.

What is this?\nThis feature imports all your concerts from \"Ditt program\" on www.malmofestivalen.se

What do I do?\nWrite the username and password that you use on www.malmofestivalen.se, and press the \"Import\" button.

What happens then?\nThe concerts from \"Ditt program\" on www.malmofestivalen.se gets imported as favorites in this program.

Why only the concerts?\nCurrently this program has been made only to display the concerts of www.malmofestivalen.se. All other events in \"Ditt program\" are ignored.

I get \"0 new events imported\"...\nThat typically means two different things:
* That the entered username or password was incorrect
* That there are no new events to import (either there are none or you already have them in this program).

What about existing favorites?\nThis feature does not change your existing favorites.

I get other errors...\nSorry, can\'t help you there. This is a very new feature (BETA), and errors can occur. Click on the Facebook icon on the start screen to give your feedback.

Errr... why is this in English?\nBecause I wanted you to have this feature as fast as possible. :o)
New information has been downloaded for you. Enjoy your festival!
